abstract: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Moody’s for the sixth time since July after the ratings company was hit by profit declines, lawsuits and criticism from regulators.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Moody’s for the sixth time since July after the ratings company was hit by profit declines, lawsuits and criticism from regulators.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in Moody’s for the sixth time since July after the ratings company was hit by profit declines, lawsuits and criticism from regulators, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Berkshire Downgrades Its Stake in Moody’s
